units.title: Dataset curation
units.text: We curated all neural organoid datasets used in this study through the sfaira78 framework (GitHub dev branch, 18 April 2023).
units.rationale: Collects the raw datasets for downstream analysis.

units.title: Metadata harmonization
units.text: We harmonized metadata according to the sfaira standards (https://sfaira.readthedocs.io/en/latest/adding_datasets.html).

units.title: Cell‑type hierarchy construction
units.text: We constructed a hierarchy of cell types from the location provided in the data availability section for every dataset, including progenitor, neuron and non‑neural types, each defined by a set of marker genes (Supplementary Data 1).
units.rationale: Defines the reference framework for annotation.

units.title: RSS3 representation
units.text: We represented the data by the RSS3 to average expression profiles of cell clusters in the recently published human developing brain cell atlas27.
units.rationale: Creates a common feature space for integration.

units.title: kNN graph and Leiden clustering
units.text: We constructed a kNN graph (k = 30) in the RSS space and clustered the dataset using the Leiden algorithm83 (resolution 80).

units.title: Removal of non‑applicable subsets
units.text: We removed any non‑applicable subsets of the published data-sets: diseased samples or samples expressing disease-associated mutations (refs. 14–16,18,19,26), fused organoids (ref. 1), primary fetal data (refs. 10,23), hormone‑treated samples (ref. 22), data collected before neural induction (refs. 3,20) and share‑seq data (ref. 23).
units.rationale: Excludes data that could confound the analysis.

units.title: AUROC and detection‑rate computation
units.text: For each cell type, we computed the area under the receiver operating characteristic curve (AUROC) as well as the detection rate across clusters.
units.rationale: Quantifies how well marker genes identify each cell type.

units.title: AnnData concatenation
units.text: We concatenated all remaining datasets to create a single AnnData80 object.
units.rationale: Combines all processed data into one analysis object.

units.title: Low‑gene‑count cell removal
units.text: we removed any cells with fewer than 200 genes expressed.

units.title: Log‑normalization of expression matrix
units.text: We generated a log‑normalized expression matrix by first dividing the counts for each cell by the total counts in that cell and multiplying by a factor of 1,000,000 before taking the natural log of each count + 1.
units.rationale: Standardizes expression values for downstream modeling.
